title: For Our Sins (Private Film Screening)
desc:
Synopsis:?For Our Sins is a psycho drama that vaguely depicts an actual event. When the line becomes blurred between an indigent spectator and a vigilante. 
 We would like to invite you for a private screening of our first major film For Our Sins. Come and dive into what the film has to offer followed by Q&A by the cast and crew. This will be the only screening before it makes the festival curcuit. 
 This has a semi formal dress code. No jeans. 
 For trailer and posters: Visit www.ugpny.com/fos
